ygData.messageBody:
At 10:20 PM 5/13/99 +0200, you wrote:

I don't think there needs to be any change. If you are totally empty of mana
at the end of a fight then you aren't using your tanks efficiently. Not
playing with tanks? Well then that is the cost of doing so. Each fo the
three components of the triad has its use. Clerics heal mages Nuke, Tanks
absord damage and dish out a steady stream too.
Increasing the mana regen rate would have a direct effect on a wizards
usefullness but would help Enchanters far less, since most of our spells
can't stack.


>From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>
>In my first post i don't explained it good so i try to explain it better.
>I like to play a wizard as i play wizards in all games for more than 12
>years now, but if we talk about balancing all magic users to same lv then i
>see some problems with a wizard class, i wish to see your comments on this
>and other ideas to make a game more playable without throwing a balance out
>or tring to make a overpowerfull class.
>
>First positive things
>
>- wizards are great for plane(after 34+ lv), group travel (druid is best
>in individual and nearly as good in group)
>- wizards are best in DD damage spells (but not in damage to mana ratio DOT)
>- wizards spells are less resisted and it damage at last for one part
>moust other class spells are resisted full
>- wizard is fastest to deal a massive damage in shortest time (but a price?)
>

All good things IMHO

>Negativ things
>
>- Wizards have lowest defence, hit points and ac of all classes (lowest
>combat survivel)

Ahh but you shouldn't be nuking until the Tank has beuilt up a good long
position at the top of the mobs hate list.


>- wizard spells do massive damage but also use masive mana but when wizard
>uses it mana it is useless. Fighting is not a wizard strong side, wizard
>dont have pets, dont have buffs, dont heal, they dont run well.

If you are soloing as a wizard youa re taking a chance that your root won't
fail at the wrong time, if not you ahve to learn to relax and let the other
members of the party soak up damage too. You will decrease downtime by far
if you allow the tank to lose hitpoints which the cleric can heal, and you
reserve msot mana for killing runners and a couple of good mid fight nukes.
Unless its an emergency I never burn over 1.5-2 bubbles of mana per fight.


>- Wizards risks very very much in combat agains only 2 blues
>

True, but then again the game is built around grouping. If everyone is
facing 2 mobs in the group thats a train and you should do whatever you do
when your screwed and need to escape.


>First i don't wish to say that a wizard is not good or playable class it is
